1. A program to print the sum of 2 numbers without using + operator :

public class Addition {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
			  int num1 = 42;
			  int num2 = 15;

			  System.out.println("XOR Result =" +(num1 ^ num2));


	}

}

Result :

XOR Result =37
